detail_desc: Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and short, elasticated puff sleeves with a frill trim. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Block-coloured swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist, a fake fly and a small appliqué at the bottom of one leg. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Top in soft, fine-knit cotton with a print motif and wrapover hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a longer layer in a contrasting colour at the hem with short slits in the sides.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline and sewn-on ties at the front. Long, wide sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared hem.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline and sewn-on ties at the front. Long, wide sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared hem.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams and an elasticated waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams and an elasticated waist.

Calf-length dress in lace with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Open section at the back and a concealed button at the back of the neck. Cap sleeves, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, flared skirt. Partly lined in jersey.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with smocking over the bust and a small frill trim at the top. Tie-top shoulder straps and decorative pearly buttons down the front.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with smocking over the bust and a small frill trim at the top. Tie-top shoulder straps and decorative pearly buttons down the front.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Calf-length kaftan in an airy weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the top. Concealed buttons down the front and short sleeves.

Short dress in airy chiffon with flounces down the front and back, a V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined. The polyester content of the chiffon is partly recycled.
